name: Samuel A. BYLER, Individually, Melvin R. Yoder, Individually, Emanuel A. Yoder, Individually, and on Behalf of All Others of the Old Order Amish of Sugar Grove Township, Warren County, Pennsylvania, Petitioners v. SUGAR GROVE AREA SEWER AUTHORITY, Respondent

parties: Samuel A. BYLER, Individually, Melvin R. Yoder, Individually, Emanuel A. Yoder, Individually, and on Behalf of All Others of the Old Order Amish of Sugar Grove Township, Warren County, Pennsylvania, Petitioners v. SUGAR GROVE AREA SEWER AUTHORITY, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
